alert.note: Alert for Bland; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...An isolated thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of southern Bland and Wythe Counties through NOON EDT... At 1111 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with heavy rainfall near Bland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall. Isolated cloud-to-ground lightning strikes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding and ponding of water on roadways, including Interstate 77 between Bland and Wytheville. Locations impacted include... Wytheville... Bland... Max Meadows... Patterson... Bastian... Fort Chiswell... and Grahams Forge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
